text: vipacāram ceyta peṇ, vipacāram ceyta āṇ ivarkaḷil ovvoruvaraiyum nūṟu kacaiyaṭikaḷ aṭiyuṅkaḷ. Meyyākavē nīṅkaḷ allāhvaiyum iṟuti nāḷaiyum nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷāka iruntāl, allāh vititta ikkaṭṭaḷaiyai niṟaivēṟṟuvatil, avviruvarkaḷuṭaiya viṣayattil uṅkaḷukku irakkam ēṟpaṭakkūṭātu. Avviruvarukkum (taṇṭaṉaiyāka) vētaṉai koṭukkum camayattil nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷil oru tokaiyiṉar ataṉ camīpamāka irukkavum
